mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (userId, userPwd, userName, birth,tel,addr,cardNum,cardPwd,email,businessNum,gender ) VALUES (#{userId},#{userPwd}, #{userName} ,#{birth},#{tel},#{addr},#{cardNum},#{cardPwd} ,#{email},#{businessNum},#{gender} )
mapper.select: SELECT userId, userPwd, userName,birth,tel,email,addr,created_date,modify_date ,businessNum,success_money,success_count,badReport,cardNum,cardPwd FROM member WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photo( userId, imageFilename) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{imageFilename})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM photo WHERE userID IN (select userId from dealjoin WHERE dealNum=#{num})
SELECT m.userId,userName,tel,email,addr,businessNum, imageFilename FROM member m JOIN photo p ON p.userId=m.userId WHERE businessNum NOT IN('0')
